name: ae-to-json
description: will export an After Effects project as a JSON object

scripts.watch: npm run open-ae; nodemon -w src/ -w test/ -x npm -- run test-build-run
scripts.test: npm run open-ae; npm run test-build-run;
scripts.test-build: npm run compile-ae; npm run clean-root-test;
scripts.compile-ae: npm run transpile; npm run after-effects;
scripts.after-effects: npm run after-effects-header; npm run after-effects-browserify; npm run after-effects-cat-footer
scripts.compile-dist: npm run transpile; cp src/dist.js dist.js; browserify dist.js -o dist/index.js; npm run clean-root
scripts.clean-root-test: ls -l1 *.js | grep -v after-effects.js | xargs rm *.js; rm -rf util/
scripts.export-example: npm run open-ae; npm run test-build; babel-node example/exportExample.js
